Road Update

August 17, 2013

Put in a couple uneventful days since the Porcupine Mountains. Two lane highways, rolling hills, little towns barely holding onto their place in the world. Enjoying some simple head-down bike riding.

---------------------
closed shops are a familar site these days
a trail of cherry seeds behind me
---------------------
